data.heading: Introduction
data.text:
Project Name: Medical Shop Automation

Developers: Devangi Naliyadhara , Kenil Bhingradiya

attributesChanged.text: Project Name: Medical Shop Automation

Project Name: Medical Shop Automation

Developers: Yash Sakaria, Jainam Gandhi

children.heading: Purpose
children.text: The purpose of this software is to automate the inventory management, medicine sales, bill generation, statistical report generation, etc. One more feature that is must is to generate the medicine orders based on the data of the inventory.

attributesChanged.text: The purpose of this software is to automize

children.heading: Scope
children.text:
1. The user of this software will be the Medical Shop owner.

2. Medicine Shop owners can track their orders, sales and automate the inventory management including deficit medicine automation etc.

attributesChanged.text: 1. The user of this software will be the Medical Shop owner and

1. The user of this software will be the Medical Shop owner.

2.

children.heading: Product perspective
children.text:
MSA is a standalone application which includes all the features and functionalities mentioned in the product functions sections.

It also includes a portal to banking services to issue cheques for the orders.

attributesChanged.text: MSA is a standalone application which includes all the features and functionalities mentioned in the

children.heading: System interfaces
children.text: This is an application which runs on all the latest version of Android/IOS. It also has an Web Application which runs on almost all the newer versions of the browsers.

attributesChanged.text: This is an application which runs on all the latest version of Android/IOS. It also has an Web Application which runs

children.heading: User interfaces
children.text:
1. The applications should provide a portal for user login whose backend is grouped as per the organization.

2. It should provide statistical information in the form of graphs which are easy to interpret.

3. It should have GUI which includes buttons, menus to ease the work of the user.

children.heading: Hardware interfaces
children.text:
1. It should have a facility to connect the app to the printer for printing bills, cheques.

2. It requires a scanning portal to scan the medicines while generating a bill or updating inventory.

children.heading: Software interfaces
children.text:
1. The application will interact with an external Database Management System to store data and query it effectively

2. The application will interact with external bank portal to verify account details and make payments.

attributesChanged.text: 1. The application will

1. The application will interact with an external Database Management System to store data and query it effectively

2.

1. The application will interact with an external Database Management System to store data and query it effectively

2. The application will interact with external bank portal to verify account details and make payments.

3.

children.heading: Communications interfaces
children.text: The System shall be using HTTP/HTTPS for communication over Internet and for intranet communications, it shall use TCP/IP protocol

attributesChanged.text: The application follows client-server based service.
The application follows client-server based service. It should use a REST based web app service. For secured requests, it should use HTTPS.

children.heading: Memory constraints
children.text: There are no specified constraints on memory however the storage of data should be optimized so that queries run optimally.

children.heading: Operations
children.text:
1. Different users should be given rights to access the inventory and use software features accordingly.

2. Printing Cheques, bills, order receipts should be provided.

3. Inventory management should be done on daily basis which includes maintaining the quantity of medicine as per the threshold.

4. Data should be backed up on regular intervals to avoid any data loss during system failure.

children.heading: Interfaces with  services
children.text:
1. Should Interact with external bank portals.

2. Should interact with external hardware such as printers, scanners etc.

3. Should interact with the any cloud platform if required.

children.heading: Product functions
children.text:
1.  A feature that can add a new medicine to the database. Should be able to add Medicine Trade name, Medicine Generic Name, Vendors selling it, Unit Selling Price, Unit Purchasing Price, Quanitity that I have. This features should also allocate a unique Code Number to the medicine automatically. 

2.  A feature that enables me to update the stock, price and other details whenever new stock arrives. 

3.  Features to run queries on the database such as showing details of medicine given the generic name/Code number (quantity, price, etc), vendor-wise list of medicines and their details, quantity based sorting of medicine, price-wise sorting, same medicine having different vendors, etc.

4.  One-click feature that gives a list of expired medicine at any given time.

5.  A feature that gives me a list of medicine to be ordered at the end of each day. This should be decided based on the threshold quantity of that particular medicine. The threshold quantity should be calculated as average quatity required per week and this value should be updated every week based on past 4 weeks data. If the quantity goes below threshold value, the medicine should be added to that list. The list should show the quantity required, other details of the medicine and vendor from whom to buy. 

6.  Should be able to generate a Bill/Cash Receipt for particular order. I should be able to enter Code number of medicine and quantity required. 

7.  A feature help me to keep track of my purchases. It should give vendor-wise purchase receipts that contains details such as Code number of medicine, quantity, batch number, expiry date, vendor number etc. 

8.  Statistical graph that show amount of medicines sold monthly (vendor-wise, individually),  my profits per medicine, avg revenue, avg profit for any given period of time.

children.heading: User  characteristics
children.text:
1. The edit access of inventory should be provided to only the Shop owner/manager. 

2. Other features such as issuing bills of the orders, issuing orders etc. should be given to owner only.

3. Similarly, hierarchical structure should be followed for giving rights to the users of the application.

children.heading: Limitations
children.text:
1. Don't have efficient and cheap data backup plan.

2. Parallel update to database by multiple users may lead to inconsistent state which we get to know at the end of generating any bill.

children.heading: Assumptions and dependencies
children.text:
1. Assumed the application will run with same efficiency and provide similar performance on all the browsers/OS.

2. Assumed the bank portals will be available and allow users to make payments.

3. Assumed the database to be scalable

children.heading: Acronyms and abbreviations
children.text:
MSA - Medical Shop Automation

GUI - Graphical User Interface

REST - Representational State Transfer

HTTPS - Hyper Text Transfer Protocol Secure

OS - Operating System

ACID - Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, and Durability

DBMS - Database Management System

attributesChanged.text:

GUI - Graphical User Interface

REST - Representational State Transfer

HTTPS - Hyper Text Transfer Protocol Secure

OS - Operating System

children.heading: External interfaces
children.text:
1. Cloud Portal - For deploying certain functionalities on cloud.

2. Bank Portal - for issuing payment requests.

children.heading: Generate Medicine Sales Statistics
children.text:
Input: Medicine, Start Date, End Date

Output: Statistical graph that show amount of medicines sold monthly (vendor-wise, individually)

attributesChanged.text: Statistical graph that show amount of medicines sold monthly (vendor-wise, individually)

children.heading: Generate Vendor-wise Payment List
children.text:
Input: Order Data, Start Date, End Date

Output: Vendor wise list of orders

children.heading: Generate Profit Statistics
children.text:
Input: Sales Date, Start Date, End Date

Output: Overall profit, medicine wise profit, month wise profit etc.

children.heading: Check for Expired Medicines
children.text:
Input: Medicine Date

Output: List of medicine expired on that date along with the quantity

children.heading: Calculating threshold
children.text:
Input: Medicine and Sales Date

Output: Threshold quantity to be kept for each medicine based on the sales made.

children.heading: Printing Cheques
children.text:
Input: Vendor Details, Medicine Information

Output: Transfer the query to printer.

children.heading: Generate an Order
children.text:
Input: Medicine details

Output: Generate a bill

children.heading: Add a Medicine
children.text:
Input: Medicine Details

Output: Add/update medicine details in the inventory.

children.heading: Remove a Medicine
children.text:
Input: Medicine ID

Output: remove medicine from the database of exists.

children.heading: Usability requirements
children.text:
1. Easy UI for new users.

2. Multi language support

3. Feedback system

children.heading: Performance requirements
children.text:
1. Multidevice login

2. Large number of requests should be handled by the servers.

3. Optimize Querying time

attributesChanged.text:
1. Multidevice login

2. Large number of requests should be handled by the servers.

3.

children.heading: Logical database requirements
children.text: 1. Customer bank details on bills, owner bank details on order receipts should be encrypted/hidden. Decryption mechanism should be set up in database.

children.heading: Design constraints
children.text: 1. Scale database, cloud services as per the workload.

children.heading: Standards compliance
children.text: 1. The application should follow industry standards for storage of data and data privacy.

children.heading: Software system attributes
children.text:
1. Software should provide satisfactory performance on most of the browsers/OS.

2. Software should encrypt private user details.

3. Software should follow ACID properties of DBMS.

4. Single Software license for entire organization.

5. Software should serve requests most of the time (>99%)

attributesChanged.text: 1.

1. Software should provide satisfactory performance on most of the browsers/OS.

2. Software should encrypt private user details.

3. Software should follow ACID properties of DBMS.

4.

data.heading: Verification
data.text:
1. Verify private details encryption.

2. Verify consistency of database.

3. Verify banking portal requests.

4. Verify all the functionalities implemented in application.

data.heading: Supporting information
data.text: We took reference from the different Inventory Management, Billing Automation Software's SRS and add features according to our priorities and requirements.

attributesChanged.text: 1.

1. https://www.freeprojectz.com/projects/medical-shop-automation-system
